rev.comment: This image use does not comply with [[WP:NFCC]] #10c and MUST be removed until it does. Thank you.

Line 1: Line 1: â
[[Image:Metro Light Rail logo.png|100px|Metro Light Rail|right|]]
 
[[File:Track works dulwhich hill constitution road overpass.jpg|thumb|upright|Trackwork near the future Arlington stop; Johnson Park is on the left]]
[[File:Track works dulwhich hill constitution road overpass.jpg|thumb|upright|Trackwork near the future Arlington stop; Johnson Park is on the left]]
'''Arlington MLR station''' is a planned light rail stop on the [[Metro Light Rail]] line in [[Sydney]], [[New South Wales]], [[Australia]] located in the suburb of [[Dulwich Hill, New South Wales|Dulwich Hill]] - adjacent to Constitution Road and Johnson Park. The stop is planned for completion in 2012. The stop's name is a reference to the nearby Arlington Recreation Ground (Oval) - a local sports venue.<ref>[http://www.transport.nsw.gov.au/sites/default/files/publications/SLRE-Preliminary-Environmental-Assessment.pdf Sydney Light Rail Extension - Stage 1 - Inner West Extension - Preliminary Environmental Assessment.] Appendix A. Transport NSW.</ref>
